articles.author: Lim Hui Jie
articles.title: Asia markets slip as Japan real wages fall for 26th straight month; China stocks drop for fifth day - CNBC
articles.description: China's inflation data for June will be out on Wednesday, while U.S. inflation numbers will be released Thursday stateside
articles.content:
Asia-Pacific markets opened mixed on Monday as investors awaited key economic data from the U.S. and China later this week, while election results in France overnight signaled a hung parliament.
